attributes.action: FORCE 'Norwich City Council' to introduce more recycling points in and around the city centre for public use.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Norwich has currently 10 mini-recycling banks in and around the city center. We think that Norwich's population and visitors will recycle more away from home if there is more was to do so. We are petitioning the Prime Minister to force introduction of more Mini-Banks in Norwich.
